document_data.caption: A map showing Mushir Island off the coast of the Cities of the Pantheon.
document_data.name: Mushir Island
document_data.mainbody: '''Mushir Island''' was an island within the [[Crowded Sea]] of [[interior Zakhara]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B2bSWIc}}
document_data.Geography: Mushir Island was located southwest of the [[Cities of the Pantheon]] region of Zakhara. It was one of the southern islands that composed [[Al-Faraq Islands]]. Mushir Island was approximately {{SI|30|mi|k|long=yes}} long and {{SI|15|mi|k|long=yes}} wide. The eastern coast of the island was formed from rocky beaches while the western side was sandy. Submerged rocks lined the eastern coast and the western coast of the island was filled with coral reefs. A circular elevation was located in the southern section of the island. The island was uninhabited as of [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
